title: Zephyr Verona Island Range Hood
description: Verona is topped with a straight glass canopy that also serves as an ambiance setting LED display. Select the Cloud White, Deep Blue and Amber color options to best match your kitchen's décor, or choose the Demo mode that displays all three settings in 10-second intervals. A Next Generation Europa model, Verona includes Zephyr's DCBL Suppression System™ with Bloom™ HD LED light bulbs and LCD display controls.
